card.name: Boros Mastiff
card.property: Battalion — Whenever Boros Mastiff and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Mastiff gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Haazda Snare Squad
card.property: Whenever Haazda Snare Squad attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They've been probation officers, army grunts, bounty hunters—anything to make their district safer.

card.name: Lyev Decree
card.property: Detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Azorius have so many codes and statutes that you're always in violation of one of them.

card.name: Maze Sentinel
card.property: Vigilance Multicolored creatures you control have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The route has been known for millennia, but only by those with no means to tell it.

card.name: Renounce the Guilds
card.property: Each player sacrifices a multicolored permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scores will die in the name of peace. That is what you call compromise?" —Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

card.name: Riot Control
card.property: You gain 1 life for each creature your opponents control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ravnicans need order. If they don't have it, we shall bring it to them." —Isperia

card.name: Scion of Vitu-Ghazi
card.property: When Scion of Vitu-Ghazi enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

card.name: Steeple Roc
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes it forgets to loosen its grip before taking flight. I lost my roof that way." —Ecaban, Boros scout

card.name: Sunspire Gatekeepers
card.property: When Sunspire Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will pass with respect, or you will not pass at all."

card.name: Wake the Reflections
card.property: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army." —Lalia, Selesnya dryad

card.name: Aetherling
card.property: {U}: Exile Aetherling. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. {U}: Aetherling can't be blocked this turn. {1}: Aetherling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Aetherling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hidden Strings
card.property: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Maze Glider
card.property: Flying Multicolored creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pattern of the Implicit Maze extends in more than two dimensions.

card.name: Mindstatic
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {6}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's always satisfying to stymie the best efforts of a rival, but the reactions of the Gruul are particularly amusing." —Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

card.name: Murmuring Phantasm
card.property: Defender

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most insidious thing in the world is nonsense that sounds just plausible enough to listen to." —Lazav

card.name: Opal Lake Gatekeepers
card.property: When Opal Lake Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sentries guard Ravnica's landmarks and outlying districts, unaware of these places' import to the maze.

card.name: Runner's Bane
card.property: Enchant creature with power 3 or less When Runner's Bane enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Trait Doctoring
card.property: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Uncovered Clues
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Implicit Maze winds through Ravnica, connecting arcane landmarks of all ten guilds.

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Air currents whip through the city corridors, creating wind tunnels that accelerate urban drakes toward their prey.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm in the field of procurement, and business is good. The guilds want all kinds of maps and relics these days, though what they want them for I'm not quite sure."

card.name: Blood Scrivener
card.property: If you would draw a card while you have no cards in hand, instead draw two cards and lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Make sure you bleed the fine print.

card.name: Crypt Incursion
card.property: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard. You gain 3 life for each card exiled this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari maze-runner Varolz hungers to prove his fortitude in battle, and his trail of victims feeds other hungers.

card.name: Fatal Fumes
card.property: Target creature gets -4/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers in the undercity dread the horrors and assassins of the Dimir, but nearly as many die from more mundane hazards.

card.name: Hired Torturer
card.property: Defender {3}{B}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, then reveals a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Follow your passion, I always say. Might as well get paid to do what you love."

card.name: Maze Abomination
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Multicolored creatures you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Pontiff of Blight
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Rakdos Drake
card.property: Flying Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

card.name: Sinister Possession
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You caught something on a cold night's stroll? No, I'd say something caught you." —Mezim Magrah, civic healer

card.name: Ubul Sar Gatekeepers
card.property: When Ubul Sar Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many gates into the undercity, but few ways out.

card.name: Awe for the Guilds
card.property: Monocolored creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the guilds cooperate, the guildless celebrate their peaceful society. When the guilds clash, the guildless just try to keep out of the way.

card.name: Clear a Path
card.property: Destroy target creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do guards always look surprised when we bash them?" asked Ruric. "I think they expect a bribe," said Thar.

card.name: Maze Rusher
card.property: Haste Multicolored creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The maze seems to fight us at every turn, resisting our efforts to solve it." —Niv-Mizzet

card.name: Possibility Storm
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell from their hand, that player exiles it, then exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a card that shares a card type with it. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then they put all cards exiled with Possibility Storm on the bottom of their library in a random order.

card.name: Punish the Enemy
card.property: Punish the Enemy deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker and 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When justice descends, the servant will burn with the master." —Aurelia

card.name: Pyrewild Shaman
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

card.name: Riot Piker
card.property: First strike Riot Piker attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He doesn't care whether he's rioting about trade rights or just having a drunken brawl. He wakes up every morning eager to smash some heads.

card.name: Rubblebelt Maaka
card.property: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them—our enemies do." —Nedja, Gruul shaman

card.name: Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers
card.property: When Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Weapon Surge
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Battering Krasis
card.property: Trample Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Kraul Warrior
card.property: {5} {G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

card.name: Maze Behemoth
card.property: Trample Multicolored creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It returned to the leylines as quickly as it had appeared, leaving only broken bodies to mark its passage.

card.name: Mending Touch
card.property: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gift of life must be freely given. Anything less would diminish us all." —Arin, Selesnya healer

card.name: Mutant's Prey
card.property: Target creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every street corner is a hunting ground, every citizen potential prey.

card.name: Phytoburst
card.property: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phytohydras are banned as houseplants in many residential spires. If left unfed, they find their own exit—usually at the cost of extensive property damage.

card.name: Renegade Krasis
card.property: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever Renegade Krasis evolves, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Saruli Gatekeepers
card.property: When Saruli Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you gain 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Ravnica's wilder districts, nature still stirs, and its protectors still mind their posts.

card.name: Skylasher
card.property: Flash This spell can't be countered. Reach, protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It preys on those who would spy on our lands, so we never prey on it." —Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Thrashing Mossdog
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Advent of the Wurm
card.property: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wolf-riders of Selesnya apprentice from a young age. Each rider raises a wolf pup from birth to serve as a mount, hoping that one day the two will share the honor of guarding the Great Concourse.

card.name: Ascended Lawmage
card.property: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lawmage's runic script is an act of governance given form: legislation written directly onto the air itself.

card.name: Beetleform Mage
card.property: {G} {U}: Beetleform Mage gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the Simic say to take command of your life, we don't mean just your career." —Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Blast of Genius
card.property: Choose any target. Draw three cards, then discard a card. Blast of Genius deals damage equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ral Zarek's brainstorms bring actual thunder and lightning.

card.name: Blaze Commando
card.property: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage, create two 1/1 red and white Soldier creature tokens with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true Boros commando only calls for reinforcements so they can clean up the mess.

card.name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
card.property: Lifelink, protection from white and from black As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

card.name: Boros Battleshaper
card.property: At the beginning of each combat, up to one target creature attacks or blocks this combat if able and up to one target creature can't attack or block this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leaders shape the minds of their allies. It takes a master to shape the minds of enemies.

card.name: Bred for the Hunt
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some see the world as a place of infinite wonder and knowledge. Some see it as an infinite dinner plate.

card.name: Bronzebeak Moa
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.

card.name: Carnage Gladiator
card.property: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life. {1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

card.name: Council of the Absolute
card.property: As Council of the Absolute enters the battlefield, choose a noncreature, nonland card name. Your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name. Spells with the chosen name you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Deadbridge Chant
card.property: When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Debt to the Deathless
card.property: Each opponent loses two times X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of Orzhov's cruelest collectors remember their debtors by taste alone.

card.name: Deputy of Acquittals
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dragonshift
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue and red Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, loses all abilities, and gains flying. Overload {3}{U}{U}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Drown in Filth
card.property: Choose target creature. Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each land card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rot farmer's first rite of passage is to craft a pair of work stilts.

card.name: Emmara Tandris
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creature tokens you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Selesnya needed a champion, Emmara put the ranks of her guild before herself—making her the perfect choice.

card.name: Exava, Rakdos Blood Witch
card.property: First strike, haste Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) Each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has haste.

card.name: Feral Animist
card.property: {3}: Feral Animist gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Channeling the rage of the beast is the easy part. Explaining why you woke up with no memory in a pile of mangled lawmages—that's trickier."

card.name: Fluxcharger
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may switch Fluxcharger's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One part mizzium, two parts elemental energy, eleven parts danger.

card.name: Gaze of Granite
card.property: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golgari reclaimers resent the gorgons, begrudging the loss of so many fine nutrients locked away in stone.

card.name: Gleam of Battle
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every soldier returns from battle changed: by hardship, by blood, by a glimpse of glory.

card.name: Goblin Test Pilot
card.property: Flying {T}: Goblin Test Pilot deals 2 damage to any target chosen at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All pilots and prototypes destroyed. Extensive collateral damage inflicted. Conclusion: flawless design." —Manual of Melek

card.name: Gruul War Chant
card.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born." —Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Haunter of Nightveil
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir employ the spirits of Ravnica's ancient, nameless dead, guiding their malevolence toward selected victims.

card.name: Jelenn Sphinx
card.property: Flying, vigilance Whenever Jelenn Sphinx attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few among the Azorius have ever spoken with the sphinxes, but all have felt their influence.

card.name: Korozda Gorgon
card.property: Deathtouch {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Krasis Incubation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. {1}{G}{U}, Return Krasis Incubation to its owner's hand: Put two +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.

card.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
card.property: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with converted mana cost 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Legion's Initiative
card.property: Red creatures you control get +1/+0. White creatures you control get +0/+1. {R}{W}, Exile Legion's Initiative: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next combat, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control and those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Master of Cruelties
card.property: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

card.name: Maw of the Obzedat
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The devout sacrifice themselves to it hoping for escape from their debts to the guild, but many end up owing in the afterlife.

card.name: Melek, Izzet Paragon
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast instant and sorcery spells from the top of your library. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your library, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker
card.property: Flying Whenever Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal four land cards, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

card.name: Morgue Burst
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Morgue Burst deals damage to any target equal to the power of the card returned this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let him in. He's on the list." —Olrich, Rakdos club owner

card.name: Nivix Cyclops
card.property: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Nivix Cyclops gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Notion Thief
card.property: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Obzedat's Aid
card.property: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Obzedat have revived you with purpose. Don't squander their blessing." —Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Pilfered Plans
card.property: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

card.name: Plasm Capture
card.property: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything serves a purpose. Even you." —Vorel of the Hull Clade

card.name: Progenitor Mimic
card.property: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of this creature."

card.name: Putrefy
card.property: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down." —Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Ral Zarek
card.property: +1: Tap target permanent, then untap another target permanent. −2: Ral Zarek deals 3 damage to any target. −7: Flip five coins. Take an extra turn after this one for each coin that comes up heads.

card.name: Reap Intellect
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose up to X nonland cards from it and exile them. For each card exiled this way, search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Render Silent
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

card.name: Restore the Peace
card.property: Return each creature that dealt damage this turn to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can always count on the Azorius to ruin a party." —Massacre Girl

card.name: Rot Farm Skeleton
card.property: Rot Farm Skeleton can't block. {2}{B}{G}, Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard: Return Rot Farm Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.property: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Savageborn Hydra
card.property: Double strike Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Scab-Clan Giant
card.property: When Scab-Clan Giant enters the battlefield, it fights target creature an opponent controls chosen at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Gruul, bone-crushing rage is the first priority. Accuracy comes in a distant ninetieth.

card.name: Showstopper
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The audience quickly realized a few things: it wasn't a magic trick, there wasn't candy in there, and they'd need new clothes.

card.name: Sin Collector
card.property: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

card.name: Sire of Insanity
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, each player discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its victims become mindless lunatics. Conveniently, that's the first step in joining the Cult of Rakdos.

card.name: Species Gorger
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We raised eelhawks to control the squidflies, then waspcrabs to prey on the eelhawks. Now what do we do with all these waspcrabs?" —Gulistan, Simic biomancer

card.name: Spike Jester
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.

card.name: Tajic, Blade of the Legion
card.property: Indestructible Battalion — Whenever Tajic, Blade of the Legion and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I run the maze alone, but I fight with the full might of the Legion."

card.name: Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
card.property: Vigilance, protection from creatures Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Tithe Drinker
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

card.name: Trostani's Summoner
card.property: When Trostani's Summoner enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance, a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, and a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample.

card.name: Unflinching Courage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

card.name: Varolz, the Scar-Striped
card.property: Each creature card in your graveyard has scavenge. The scavenge cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.) Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Varolz, the Scar-Striped.

card.name: Viashino Firstblade
card.property: Haste When Viashino Firstblade enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that steel doesn't make them slower. It makes them bolder." —Tajic, Blade of the Legion

card.name: Voice of Resurgence
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
card.property: {G} {U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

card.name: Warleader's Helix
card.property: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them." —Aurelia

card.name: Warped Physique
card.property: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.

card.name: Woodlot Crawler
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) Protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We learned something from the Simic. Unfortunately for them." —Nefara, Dimir agent

card.name: Zhur-Taa Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many Ravnicans think of nature as orderly groves and elf-tended rot farms. They haven't seen the Gruul wilds.

card.name: Zhur-Taa Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

card.name: Azorius Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Azorius Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its three sides represent the Sova, judges and arbitrators; the Jelenn, scribes and elocutors; and the Lyev, lawmages and enforcers.

card.name: Boros Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In case of fire, treachery, citywide riot, political upheaval, or worldwide societal collapse, break glass." —Cluestone inscription

card.name: Dimir Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It waits in the chill of the undercity, holding nameless secrets for those who dare to touch it.

card.name: Golgari Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Golgari Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golgari mold collects whispers, intelligence that is later harvested by Jarad and his high chancellors.

card.name: Gruul Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Gruul Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forgotten under rocks and vines, Gruul symbols mark the sites of primitive rituals where shamans once chanted to the wild.

card.name: Izzet Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It holds within it an unsolvable riddle. A creative answer yields an invitation to the guild.

card.name: Orzhov Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Orzhov Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of power and wealth, the only commodities that matter to the Orzhov.

card.name: Rakdos Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {B}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Rakdos Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Selesnya Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Selesnya Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Break it if you must. The loss of one relic is nothing next to the value of enriching us all." —Suniel the Woodwise

card.name: Simic Cluestone
card.property: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Simic Cluestone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic symbols are among the most intricate and fragile, yet few vandalize them for fear of the strange lifeforms that might be released.

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
card.property: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.property: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
card.property: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

card.name: Golgari Guildgate
card.property: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
card.property: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.

card.name: Izzet Guildgate
card.property: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.

card.name: Maze's End
card.property: Maze's End enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Return Maze's End to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.

card.name: Orzhov Guildgate
card.property: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness." —Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Rakdos Guildgate
card.property: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.

card.name: Selesnya Guildgate
card.property: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.

card.name: Simic Guildgate
card.property: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.
